Impossible.
Impossible.

Dr. Wen said ...

You can't let your sadness overcome you again.

column3: 还是要保重身子为重啊

Like the moon's reflection on water

column3: 如今三阿哥该改口叫额娘了

Yes.

column3: 以后本宫便是你的额娘了
column6: I will be your mother from now on.
Although you were not my child at birth,

column3: 但母子一场终究是缘分
column6: it is our fate to become mother and son.

column3: 本宫也盼望着日后能母慈子孝
column6: I hope we can be "a caring mother and a filial child"

column3: 儿臣一定尽心孝敬皇额娘
column6: I will be a filial son, Imperial Mother...
Mother.
All is well then.

column3: 齐妃侍奉皇上二十一年
column6: Consort Astuce had served His Majesty for twenty one years.

column6: I saw her entering the family as a lord concubine.

column3: 生下你之后成为侧福晋
column6: And she became a lord consort after giving birth to you.

Although she committed a grave offense,

column3: 但终究为皇家留下血脉
column6: she expanded the imperial lineage after all.
That is a great contribution.
She met a regrettable end, however...
Although His Majesty doesn't agree ...

column3: 可是本宫与她同为后宫姐妹
column6: As her good sister in the harem,
serving His Majesty for years,
I will still remember her as your birth mother.

column3: 所以本宫会去叫人戍守她的梓宫
column6: I will assign guards to protect her catalpa coffin.

column3: 希望齐妃在地下得以安宁
column6: I hope she can be at peace underground.

column3: 额娘宽宏儿臣感激不尽
column6: Mother, I am eternally grateful for your magnanimity.
Don't be so grieved, Your Majesty.

column3: 这些日子娘娘为了齐妃娘娘的事

column6: Your Majesty has been sorrowing over Consort Astuce for days.

column3: 现在三阿哥有了您的照顾
column6: Since the Third Prince has come under Your Majesty's care,
Consort Astuce can rest in peace.
If Your Majesty wallows in grief,
it will sadden the living.
I understand.

column3: 可是齐妃和本宫服侍了皇上多年
column6: But we served His Majesty for years...
How can I contain my grief

column3: 怎么可能叫本宫不伤心呢
column6: when she departed so abruptly like this?
She was an utter fool!
Mother.

column3: 儿臣生母生前有过不能补偿
column6: I can't make up for my birth mother's offense.

column3: 儿臣今后一定加倍用功读书
column6: But I will study as hard as I can,
to help carry Imperial Father's burdens.

column3: 不枉皇阿玛和额娘抚育之恩
column6:
So I can repay the care and nurturing
from you and Imperial Father.
Very good! Very good!
You are a very good child!
You are my very good child.

column3: 怎么了心事重重的样子
column6: What happened? You look preoccupied.
Are you thinking that
I haven't been taking care of Concubine Sourire,
not sending Orchid to see her?

column3: 臣妾只是担心太后的身体
column6: I am just worried about Your Majesty's condition.
When you're old and useless,
life always brings illnesses and misfortunes.
In my current condition,

column3: 敢在哀家眼皮子底下胡作非为了
column6: someone acted without scruple right under my nose.
Once I depart this world,

column3: 怕就再也庇佑不了你们了
column6: I'm afraid I will no longer be able to protect any of you.
Causing Your Majesty to speak such sad words
is my offense, and deserves a thousand deaths.
Don't worry.
Each day I'm alive, I will always protect you.
Rise.
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 芳若虽然没有出宫去照看莞嫔
column6: Although Orchid hasn't been visiting Concubine Sourire,
I don't believe the nuns
dare to mistreat her.
Her Majesty the Empress.

column3: 你听 皇后好大的架势
column6: You hear ... She makes quite an entrance.
Peace to Imperial Mother.
Not so.
Peace to you, Empress.

column3: 老婆子安不安原不必皇后在意
column6: The old crone's peace is not the Empress's concern.

column3: 太后吃了药那臣妾先告退
column6: Since Your Majesty has taken the medicine, I will excuse myself.

column3: 皇额娘言重了臣妾惶恐不安
column6:
I do not deserve you saying that, Imperial Mother.
I feel nervous and unsettled.

column3: 你惶恐应该是哀家惶恐才对啊
column6: Do you?
I should be the one who feels unsettled.

column3: 你这样的好手段逼死了齐妃
column6: Your cunning tricks imposed suicide on Consort Astuce

column3: 夺走三阿哥做自己的儿子
column6: and you took the Third Prince to be your own son.
Fast and efficient!
You are known for clear judgement, Imperial Mother.
But, I did not do that.

column3: 明鉴你敢说齐妃不是你害死的
column6: Is that not a clear judgment?
Dare you say you didn't cause Consort Astuce's death?
If you insist on saying so, Imperial Mother,
I have no words in my defense.
Of course you don't.

column3: 你急着杀了齐妃身边的翠果灭口
column6: You were so eager to kill Consort Astuce's maid Apple -
pushing her into the lotus pond.
You didn't know Apple was afraid of being mistreated,
so she came to me early on

column3: 把她所见所闻都告诉了哀家
column6: and told me what she saw and heard.

column3: 可翠果的确不是臣妾所杀
column6: But it was not me who killed Apple.

column3: 反正你做这样害人的事
column6: Anyway, it's not the first time
you've done such a malicious thing.

column3: 你的亲姐姐纯元皇后怎么死的
column6: How your sister Empress Première died -
you know that better than me.

column3: 既然皇额娘清楚这一点
column6: Since you know this, Imperial Mother,

column3: 也应该清楚臣妾所做的一切
column6: you should also know that all I've done

column3: 都是为了乌拉那拉氏家族
column6: is for our Ula-Nara clan.

column3: 皇额娘应该比臣妾更加清楚
column6: You should know more clearly than me
that with my sister's soft temperament,
she could not preside over the palace,

column3: 更不能弹压嫔妃左右平衡
column6: or quell the other concubines to maintain balance.

column3: 这样的事只有臣妾做得到
column6: Only I could do such things.
Good! You have the courage to admit what you did.

column3: 连同欣贵人和富察贵人
column6: The two miscarriages
of Lady Joie and Lady Fuca -
the sins you committed are not small in number.
When are you going to desist?

column3: 富察贵人三番四次拿皇嗣邀宠
column6: Lady Fuca curried favor with her pregnancy repeatedly.
She didn’t deserve to be the mother of an heir.
If your son were still alive,

column3: 为了皇恩你也会借孩子邀宠
column6: you would also compete for favor using your child.
I had a miserable fate.
The First Prince died early.
But I know

the Uya and Ula-Nara families are not the most prominent.
[The Empress Dowager is from the Uya family]

column3: 皇额娘千辛万苦才成为太后
column6:
You struggled through all the hardship
to become the Empress Dowager.

column3: 又保全臣妾成为皇后延续荣耀
column6:
And you ensured I would be the Empress
to preserve the glory of our clan.
I've been cautious, even trembling with fear.

column3: 所作所为都是为保家族权势
column6: All my deeds have been to preserve the prestige of our families.
I am ...
not wrong to do so.
Of course you are not wrong.

column3: 哀家从来没有做过皇后
column6: I have never been an Empress.

column3: 先帝去世以后才成为太后
column6:
I became the Empress Dowager
when the prior emperor passed away.
So when the emperor gained sovereign power,
I approved of you becoming Empress.

column3: 一定要在我们自己人的手中
column6:
It’s all been to secure the throne of the Empress
in the hands of our clan.
So I turned a blind eye
to many of your wrongdoings.
But the concubines carry in their bellies -
my own grandchildren.
I care more about my grandchildren.

column3: 无论哪个嫔妃的儿子登基
column6: No matter which concubine's son ascends to the throne,

column3: 你都是名正言顺的母后皇太后
column6: you will rightfully be the Imperial Mother Empress Dowager.

column3: 你又何必急着杀母夺子
column6: Why must you rush to kill the mother and take her son
in such a ruthless way?
Otherwise there would be two Empress Dowagers in the harem.

Instead of having "two tigers in a fight"
struggling to eliminate each other,

column3: 便没有今时今日这般方便利落
column6: now was a better time to eliminate her expeditiously.
I surely have committed crimes.
But what I have in my heart
is the entire clan of Ula-Nara.
Imperial Mother,

column6:
do you think anyone else could possibly
be head of the palace?

column3: 才是唯一母仪天下的皇后
column6: And I am the only Empress
who can be "the Mother of the Nation."

column3: 皇额娘 所以您再生气
column6: However much anger you feel, Imperial Mother,
you must know that granting my own wishes

Very well! Very well!

column3: 你现在可以算是独档一面
column6: "Command an army on your own."
Now you can exert dominance in the whole palace.
I owe it all to you, Imperial Mother,

column3: 这些年来的辛苦教导和细心庇护
column6: for your attentive guidance and careful protection.
I am eternally grateful.

column3: 实在不必再为臣妾操心
column6: You have been sick for a long time
and need not worry about me.
Your priority is rest and recovery,
lest His Majesty again suspect

column3: 才使得皇额娘凤体抱恙了
column6: that Longkodo is the cause of your illness.

column3: 你果然越来越像个皇后的样子了
column6: You have indeed become ever more like an Empress.

column3: 哀家希望你能够坐稳皇后的位子
column6: I hope you sit securely on your throne.

column3: 做人做事都要留有余地
column6:
But I have to remind you
to always leave room to maneuver.
Complete destruction of your enemies cuts off your own way out.
Thank you for the advice, Imperial Mother.

column3: 臣妾一定能够青出于蓝
column6:
Just as "Indigo exceeds blue",
I will certainly surpass my predecessor.
Imperial Mother, you can put your mind at ease.
If there are no further matters, I shall take my leave.
Bamboo ...

column3: 你瞧哀家一手教导出来的孩子
column6: Look ...
at the daughters I taught.
Première was too soft-hearted,
and Yixiu is too cruel-hearted.

column3: 太后您要多注意自己的身子啊
column6: Your Majesty must take more care of your health.

column3: 哀家不是不注意自己的身子
column6: It's not that I don't want to ...

I'm afraid that Yixiu, if set in her ways,

column3: 哀家何尝不想大清皇后

column6:
My heart hopes that the Empress of the Great Qing

column3: 但若宫中一直无人与她抗衡
column6: But if no one in the palace can balance her power,

column6: her ruthlessness
will dig her own grave and the graves of

Mistress, where did you go?

column3: 这三天三夜不吃不喝的

Even a man of iron couldn't take this.

you may as well take this medicine.

column3: 这腹中的烦恼便什么都没有了
column6: If you drink this, Mistress,
the concern in your belly will be gone.

column3: 反正娘子这样不吃不喝伤心欲绝
column6: You are too devastated to eat and drink ...

column3: 月夏中的孽障能早走一步
column6:

the unfortunate child will leave you sooner

This medicine is strong and effective.

column3: 吃下去腹内的胎儿便必死无疑

The medicine won't cause you much pain.

column6: You can trust Dr. Wen's medical skills.
Mistress, please drink this.

You have to save this child.

column3: 这可是王爷唯一的骨肉
column6: This is the only heir in His Lordship's bloodline.
You can't abandon him.
Jinxi.

column6: I won't ...
take the abortion herbs.
I want this child.

I also want my family to be well.
Yunli died.

I have to learn to protect myself,

For the child in my belly,
for my parents and my family,

column3: 更为了死得无辜的允礼

The dreams I dimly recall;

column6:
Like the moon's reflection on water

column3:
He loved me with a volatile heart.

Behind me are the promises and longing.
Before me lie the flute and the zither.

I hoped for endless longing and eternal promise,

But you hurt me from head to toe.

and I ended up a fool of my destiny.
